QuestData.Title: Shields Down!
QuestData.Description: Did you hear that? They got the shield up. There'll be no getting into Telaar now.$B$BYou must get that shield down. The only way to do it is to destroy the Arkonite crystal.$B$BDon't worry about me. You're going to kill two birds with one stone; Packleader Kargora is the one who stole your blueprints.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: She has the blueprints. Kill her and destroy the arkonite shield.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Arkonite Crystal and Collect the Garrison Blueprints from Packleader Kargora.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect! You retrieved the blueprints.$B$BThere's only one thing left to do.
